title: CMC-Based Effective Communication Skills Improvement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital device usage and understanding of work-related mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Enhancing communication skills required for performing mathematics-related tasks in managerial/leadership roles.

learning_goals: Learners can create and execute math concept explanation scenarios using various CMC tools (email, collaboration platforms, video conferencing systems).
Learners can analyze communication issues arising during online math project management and propose solutions.
Learners can develop and apply math education/work manuals that integrate CMC technology in practical settings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
